name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GC Labs Web 통합 결과 조회 서비스

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To access website, usually usually have to go through many steps such as putting ID and passwords or clicking numbers of buttons.…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To access website, usually usually have to go through many steps such as putting ID and passwords or clicking numbers of buttons. 
You just want the website to be more easy to use, therefore it was developed. 
You can get results that you want within far less clicks.
This program can remember your login details and only one click away you are all set up. 

한번의 로그인, 한번의 클릭으로 결과 페이지에 접속 할 수 있습니다.
